mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock_in_receipt (receipt_code, purchase_order_id, receipt_date, status, handler_id, remark) VALUES (#{receiptCode}, #{purchaseOrderId}, #{receiptDate}, #{status}, #{handlerId}, #{remark})
mapper.select: SELECT id, receipt_code as receiptCode, purchase_order_id as purchaseOrderId, receipt_date as receiptDate, status, handler_id as handlerId, remark, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM stock_in_receipt WHERE receipt_code = #{receiptCode}
